results.name: Dirichlet g.f.: 1 / zeta(s-1)^2.
comment: Dirichlet convolution of A055615 with itself.
mathematica: a[1] = 1; a[n_] := -Sum[(n/d) DivisorSigma[0, n/d] a[d], {d, Most @ Divisors[n]}]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 60}]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 26 2019
